testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 01 Creating a new Seat Storage Config setting the Data Format

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed When I click on "SEATS" on Administration Tab...............................undefined Then Seats page shown correctly.............................................undefined When Search and select seat "DBM TEST ACCOUNT (LIVE)".......................undefined Then Seat details page shown................................................undefined When Click on "MANAGE CREDENTIALS"..........................................undefined Then Credentials page shown.................................................undefined When Select the credential "DBM TEST ACCOUNT (LIVE)"........................undefined Then Option to add Storage Location.........................................undefined When I clicked on the Storage Locations "add" button........................undefined Then Default Values selected on add storage location popup..................undefined When Mandatory options shown on the popup...................................undefined
